scripts.bootstrap: npm run build && cross-env INFRA_ENV=development cdk bootstrap --profile development
scripts.bootstrap-prod: npm run build && cross-env INFRA_ENV=production cdk bootstrap --profile production
scripts.build: node ./scripts/defineBucketName.js && npm run build-infra && npm run build-server
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cross-env INFRA_ENV=development node ./scripts/executeS3Stack.js deploy && cross-env INFRA_ENV=development node ./scripts/uploadLayer.js && cross-env INFRA_ENV=development cdk deploy --all --require-approval never --profile development
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run build && cross-env INFRA_ENV=production node ./scripts/executeS3Stack.js deploy && cross-env INFRA_ENV=production node ./scripts/uploadLayer.js && cross-env INFRA_ENV=production cdk deploy --all --require-approval never --profile production
scripts.destroy: cross-env INFRA_ENV=development cdk destroy --all --force --profile development && node scripts/afterDestroy.js
scripts.destroy-prod: cross-env INFRA_ENV=production cdk destroy --all --force --profile production && node scripts/afterDestroy.js
scripts.diff: npm run build && cross-env INFRA_ENV=development node ./scripts/executeS3Stack.js diff && cross-env INFRA_ENV=development cdk diff --profile development
scripts.diff-prod: npm run build && cross-env INFRA_ENV=production node ./scripts/executeS3Stack.js diff && cross-env INFRA_ENV=production cdk diff --profile production
